materials.name: Fire
materials.description: Crackling orange flames dancing and leaping, radiating waves of heat that warp the air above

materials.name: Water
materials.description: Crystal-clear flowing water, rippling and splashing with cool refreshing energy

materials.name: Wind
materials.description: A rushing gust of invisible air, swirling leaves and dust in spiraling currents

materials.name: Light
materials.description: A brilliant beam of pure golden-white radiance, warm and glowing like bottled sunshine

materials.name: Stone
materials.description: A hefty chunk of rough grey granite, ancient and weathered with flecks of mica catching the light

materials.name: Metal
materials.description: A gleaming ingot of raw iron ore, dense and cold with a silvery sheen across its hammered surface

materials.name: Clay
materials.description: A wet lump of reddish-brown clay, soft and pliable with fingerprint impressions, ready to be shaped

materials.name: Wood
materials.description: A thick cut of sturdy oak timber, showing golden rings of grain and smelling of fresh sawdust

materials.name: Bone
materials.description: A pale white animal bone, smooth and hard, sun-bleached and slightly curved with hollow marrow inside

materials.name: Fiber
materials.description: A bundle of raw stringy plant fibers, golden-green strands tangled and ready to be woven or twisted into rope

materials.name: Egg
materials.description: A speckled oval egg with a delicate shell, warm to the touch and full of rich golden yolk inside

materials.name: Seed
materials.description: A small dark seed with a tough outer shell, holding a tiny curled embryo packed with potential energy

materials.name: Sand
materials.description: A pile of fine golden sand grains, warm and loose, glittering faintly like countless tiny crystals

materials.name: Coal
materials.description: A jagged chunk of jet-black coal, dusty and crumbly with a faint oily sheen, eager to burn

intents.name: Loud
intents.description: Intent — drums, bells, horns, whistles, anything that makes noise

intents.name: Bright
intents.description: Intent — lanterns, torches, mirrors, beacons, things that glow or shine

intents.name: Soft
intents.description: Intent — pillows, blankets, clothing, cushions, gentle comforts

intents.name: Sharp
intents.description: Intent — swords, knives, arrows, needles, razors, anything with an edge

intents.name: Sweet
intents.description: Intent — pastries, candy, perfume, honey, treats and pleasant aromas

intents.name: Cold
intents.description: Intent — ice boxes, preserves, cooling fans, frost, things that chill

intents.name: Tiny
intents.description: Intent — needles, keys, rings, coins, thimbles, small precise things

intents.name: Heavy
intents.description: Intent — anvils, anchors, hammers, shields, dense and weighty things

intents.name: Hollow
intents.description: Intent — vases, drums, flutes, bottles, containers and resonant chambers

intents.name: Sticky
intents.description: Intent — glue, tar, traps, tape, flypaper, anything that grips and binds

intents.name: Ancient
intents.description: Intent — runestones, relics, totems, fossils, weathered ritualistic objects

intents.name: Many
intents.description: Intent — multiplies the material into a larger collection: a brick becomes a wall, a thread becomes a tapestry, a coin becomes a treasure hoard

intents.name: Time
intents.description: Intent — accelerates natural growth and aging: a seed becomes a tree, an egg becomes a bird, wood becomes petrified wood, metal becomes rust
